name: Monster Star Super Adventure
description:
Join the most daring chase——Monster Star!
You’ll never stop playing！

A challenging adventure with the little monster! Run and jump your way through trap and puzzle filled areas. Spikes, pits, and other ,the world is full of deadly dangers.

FEATURES:

～Tap to fly！
～Five major categories, dozens of monsters！
～Collect coins-a great help to your adventure！
～Unlock more unknown enemy and props!
～64 levels，8 worlds，and more challenge coming！
